trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Minnetonka
There were no other sightings in Minnetonka on or around September 3rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOne object was streaked across the sky while driving to my house with my boyfriend and two friends. I was driving down highway 7 going west when in the corner of my eye i noticed a bright light but disappeared right away leaving only with a ghost trail behind it. I quickly jumped a bit and kind of played it off at first, shortly after on the other side of my windshield, I recognized a bright orb a few seconds then it shot in the same direction heading quickly west. As soon as the second one passed I turned my head to my boyfriend, without saying anything to him he told me "Yeah, I seen it ." I asked if he seen them both but he only seen the first one that I did, and neither of the friends in back knew what we were talking about.
Summary: Two objecta flashed across the sky in the same direction on opposite sides of the sky.
